Fence.summary: The Fence interface of the {{domxref("Fenced Frame API", "Fenced Frame API", "", "nocode")}} contains several functions relevant to fencedframe functionality.

remarks.para: Fence objects are accessed through the property, but they are only available to documents embedded inside {{htmlelement("fencedframe")}}s (loaded via s) or {{htmlelement("iframe")}}s (loaded via opaque URNs).

blockquote.para: Note: See How do <fencedframe>s work? for some description around FencedFrameConfigs and opaque URNs.

remarks.para:
-Fenced frames on developer.chrome.com
-The Privacy Sandbox on developer.chrome.com
